G-strand Chromosome end with two additional single strand repeats and a subterminal loop - Telomeric
Complex:BRCA1
Comment: BRCA1 localizes to axial elements of the synaptonemal complex in unsynapsed regions of chromosomes. The localization requires SYCP1 of the synaptonemal complex.
